pageContext.claim: “Russia, Iran, Syria & many others are not happy about the U.S. leaving, despite what the Fake News says, because now they will have to fight ISIS and others, who they hate, without us. I am building by far the most powerful military in the world. ISIS hits us they are doomed!”
pageContext.analysis: Trump tweeted this just as Russian President Vladimir Putin said he was thrilled with Trump's announcement. U.S. officials had previously said that U.S. forces were an important buffer against Iranian forces. Iran may now have a freer hand to extend its regional influence and threaten Israel. A Syrian lawmaker declared that Trump's announcement was “recognition that Syria has won” the war.
